nodes.text: The Future of the Force (French: L'avenir de la Force) is a chapter book adaptation of the Star Wars Rebels episode of the same name. The Future of the Force was published by Hachette Jeunesse on September 28, 2016.

Ahsoka is back, with a message of the utmost importance: Ezra, Kanan and Zeb must imperatively go to the planet Takobo, to thwart the plans of the Empire! But once facing the Inquisitors, the Rebels realize that the situation is much more serious than they imagined ... Will they succeed in protecting the Future of the Force?
